{0}The game will save automatically at the end of every round. Only end the game through the designated button.
Not doing so WILL corrupt the save of this game
You can set a custom name for this Slot here

dynamic.overwrite: This Action will overwrite the current slot {0}!

confirm.confirm_text:
The game will save automatically at the end of every round. Only end the game through the designated button.
Not doing so WILL corrupt the save of this game
You can set a new custom name for this Slot here

contents.end_turn_continue: End this round, and continue to the next round
contents.end_turn_quit: End this round, and quit the game

reliability.tooltip:
the more reliable the company is,
the more consistent it's deliveries are

price.tooltip:
the actual price for a contract varies
based on this company's sentiment towards you

capacity.tooltip: how much of the resource you can order in total

duration.tooltip: the boundries for the duration of a potentia contract

cancel_notice.tooltip: If you cancel a contract prematurely, It's remaining duration will be set to max(min_duration-duration_left,cancel_notice)

sentiment.tooltip: how much this company likes you

sales.tab_tooltip: view how your and other companies' chocolate is selling

rnd.tab_tooltip: Unlock perks to secure the future of your company

content.title: YOU'RE BANKRUPT
content.text: your company doesn't have enough funds to keep working, so it has to delcare bankruptcy, it currently has a debt of {0} CHF
content.end_game: End Game, and return to main menu

full_event_description.probability: total probablility = base probability {0}% + probability modifier {1}% = {2}%
full_event_description.excludes_none: can run simultaneous to every other event

inflation.name: Inflation
inflation.description: Everything constantly gets more expensive (but rather slowly).

high_inflation.name: High Inflation
high_inflation.description: Extraordinarily high inflation, More common during economic boom.

deflation.name: Deflation
deflation.description: Prices decrease. More common during economic depression.

cancel_contracts.name: Resource contracts cancelling
cancel_contracts.description: A resource company (or multiples of them) canceles contracts. Better check you're not affected

cancel_contracts_s_event.name: Resource contracts cancelling
cancel_contracts_s_event.description: The Function that makes this event possible

disable_companies.name: Resource companies bancruptcy
disable_companies.description: A resource company (or multiples of them) has gone out of business

disable_companies_s_event.name: Resource companies bancruptcy
disable_companies_s_event.description: The Function that makes this event possible

reduce_capacity.name: Resource companies reduces capacity
reduce_capacity.description: A resource company (or multiples of them) has to reduce their production capacity

reduce_capacity_s_event.name: Resource companies reduces capacity
reduce_capacity_s_event.description: The Function that makes this event possible

economic_cycle.name: Economic cycle
economic_cycle.description: How well the economy is doing changes from time to time, this represents this, from economic growth to boom, to recession to depression, then from the beginning.

workers.name: factory workers

resource_companies.renew_tooltip: receive proposal for contract extension (same amount, remaining duration set to original duration)
resource_companies.no_new_contract_sentiment: This company refuses to negotiate a new contract
resource_companies.no_new_contract_capacity: This company has reached it's full production capacity
resource_companies.canceled_contracts: due to this company's capacity decreasing, it had to cancel one or more contracts with immediate effect

chocoline_production.tab_tooltip: Robust industry line for cheap mass production. High throughput, low costs.

cl_basic_unlock.name: Unlock ChocoLine Basic
cl_basic_unlock.description: Entry-level system for cost-efficient production of simple chocolate bars.

cl_2000_unlock.name: Unlock ChocoLine 2000
cl_2000_unlock.description: Improved heating and stirring technology for uniform cosistency at high speed.

cl_pro_unlock.name: Unlock ChocoLine Pro
cl_pro_unlock.description: Standardized mass production with automated temperature control.

cl_elite_unlock.name: Unlock ChocoLine Elite
cl_elite_unlock.description: Optimized energy efficiency and process stability for cost saving production.

cl_improve_efficiency1.name: Improve Efficiency (1/2)
cl_improve_efficiency1.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 5% for ChocoLine Basic and ChocoLine 2000.
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cl_improve_efficiency2.name: Improve Efficiency (2/2)
cl_improve_efficiency2.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 10% for all ChocoLine Production Machines.(including boost from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cl_improve_quality1.name: Improve Quality (1/2)
cl_improve_quality1.description:
Improves the quality of Chocolate produced by ChocoLine Basic and ChocoLine 2000 by 0.05.
Non-compatible with "Improve Efficiency".

cl_improve_quality2.name: Improve Quality (2/2)
cl_improve_quality2.description:
mproves the quality of Chocolate produced by all ChocoLine production machines by 0.1 .(including bonus from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cl_reduce_cost1.name: Reduce Cost (1/2)
cl_reduce_cost1.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 10% for ChocoLine Basic, ChocoLine 2000 and Chocoline Pro.

cl_reduce_cost2.name: Reduce Cost (2/2)
cl_reduce_cost2.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all ChocoLine Production Machines.

cl_reduce_maintenance1.name: Reduce Maintenance (1/2)
cl_reduce_maintenance1.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 10% for ChocoLine Basic, ChocoLine 2000 and Chocoline Pro.

cl_reduce_maintenance2.name: Reduce Maintenance (2/2)
cl_reduce_maintenance2.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all ChocoLine production machines.

cl_reduce_employee_requirement1.name: Reduce Required Employees (1/2)
cl_reduce_employee_requirement1.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for ChocoLine 2000 and 2 for ChocoLine Pro.
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

cl_reduce_employee_requirement2.name: Reduce Required Employees (2/2)
cl_reduce_employee_requirement2.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for ChocoLine Basic, 2 for ChocoLine 2000, 3 for ChocoLine Pro, 4 for ChocoLine Elite and 5 for ChocoLine Ultra. (including reduction from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

cl_reduce_resource_consumption1.name: Reduce Resource Consumption (1/2)
cl_reduce_resource_consumption1.description:
ChocoLine 2000 and Chocoline Pro use resources a bit more efficiently.
Non-compatible with "Reduce Required Employees".

cl_reduce_resource_consumption2.name: Reduce Resource Consumption (2/2)
cl_reduce_resource_consumption2.description:
ChocoLine Elite and Chocoline Ultra use resources a bit more efficiently.
Non-compatible with "Reduce Required Employees".

cocoafusion_production.tab_tooltip: A balanced production system for manufacturers who value both efficiency and flavor.

cf_one_unlock.name: Unlock CocoaFusion One
cf_one_unlock.description: Compact system with precise mixing control.

cf_duo_unlock.name: Unlock CocoaFusion Duo
cf_duo_unlock.description: Dual-chamber-system for contolled melting process and even cocoa distribution.

cf_pulse_unlock.name: Unlock CocoaFusion Pulse
cf_pulse_unlock.description: Vibration- and magnet-assisted stirring for a silkier texture and smoother melt.

cf_apex_unlock.name: Unlock CocoaFusion Apex
cf_apex_unlock.description: AI-driven process regulation improving taste, stability, and production yield.

cf_zenith_unlock.name: Unlock CocoaFusion Zenith
cf_zenith_unlock.description: Fully integrated control of aroma, gloss, and texture.

cf_improve_efficiency1.name: Improve Efficiency (1/2)
cf_improve_efficiency1.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 5% for CocoaFusion One and CocoaFusion Duo.
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cf_improve_efficiency2.name: Improve Efficiency (2/2)
cf_improve_efficiency2.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 10% for all CocoaFusion Production Machines.(including boost from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cf_improve_quality1.name: Improve Quality (1/2)
cf_improve_quality1.description:
Improves the quality of Chocolate produced by CocoaFusion One and CocoaFusion Duo by 0.05.
Non-compatible with "Improve Efficiency".

cf_improve_quality2.name: Improve Quality (2/2)
cf_improve_quality2.description:
mproves the quality of Chocolate produced by all CocoaFusion production machines by 0.1 .(including bonus from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

cf_reduce_cost1.name: Reduce Cost (1/2)
cf_reduce_cost1.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 10% for CocoaFusion One, CocoaFusion Duo and CocoaFusion Pulse.

cf_reduce_cost2.name: Reduce Cost (2/2)
cf_reduce_cost2.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all CocoaFusion Production Machines.

cf_reduce_maintenance1.name: Reduce Maintenance (1/2)
cf_reduce_maintenance1.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 10% for CocoaFusion One, CocoaFusion Duo and CocoaFusion Pulse.

cf_reduce_maintenance2.name: Reduce Maintenance (2/2)
cf_reduce_maintenance2.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all CocoaFusion production machines.

cf_reduce_employee_requirement1.name: Reduce Required Employees (1/2)
cf_reduce_employee_requirement1.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for CocoaFusion Duo and 2 for CocoaFusion Pulse.
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

cf_reduce_employee_requirement2.name: Reduce Required Employees (2/2)
cf_reduce_employee_requirement2.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for CocoaFusion One, 2 for CocoaFusion Duo, 3 for CocoaFusion Pulse, 4 for CocoaFusion Apex and 5 for CocoaFusion Zenith. (including reduction from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

cf_reduce_resource_consumption1.name: Reduce Resource Consumption (1/2)
cf_reduce_resource_consumption1.description:
CocoaFusion Duo and CocoaFusion Pulse use resources a bit more efficiently.
Non-compatible with "Reduce Required Employees".

cf_reduce_resource_consumption2.name: Reduce Resource Consumption (2/2)
cf_reduce_resource_consumption2.description:
CocoaFusion Apex and CocoaFusion Zenith use resources a bit more efficiently.
Non-compatible with "Reduce Required Employees".

quantumcreme_production.tab_tooltip: Cutting-edge technology for luxurious chocolate with velvety smoothness, complex flavor depth, and flawless texture.

qc_alpha_unlock.name: Unlock QuantumCrème Α
qc_alpha_unlock.description: Nano-fine grinding of cocoa mass for ultra-creamy base textures.

qc_beta_unlock.name: Unlock QuantumCrème Β
qc_beta_unlock.description: Molecular flavor extraction — enhances natural cocoa and nut nuances.

qc_gamma_unlock.name: Unlock QuantumCrème Γ
qc_gamma_unlock.description: Adaptive tempering control for perfect gloss and silky consistency.

qc_delta_unlock.name: Unlock QuantumCrème Δ
qc_delta_unlock.description: AI-guided flavor optimization — every batch individually calibrated.

qc_omega_unlock.name: Unlock QuantumCrème Ω
qc_omega_unlock.description: Fully autonomous luxury production: absolute purity, zero waste, and maximum indulgence.

qc_improve_efficiency1.name: Improve Efficiency (1/2)
qc_improve_efficiency1.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 5% for QuantumCrème Α and QuantumCrème Β.
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

qc_improve_efficiency2.name: Improve Efficiency (2/2)
qc_improve_efficiency2.description:
Increases the Output per hour by 10% for all QuantumCrème Production Machines.(including boost from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

qc_improve_quality1.name: Improve Quality (1/2)
qc_improve_quality1.description:

Non-compatible with "Improve Efficiency".

qc_improve_quality2.name: Improve Quality (2/2)
qc_improve_quality2.description:
mproves the quality of Chocolate produced by all QuantumCrème production machines by 0.1 .(including bonus from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "Improve Quality".

qc_reduce_cost1.name: Reduce Cost (1/2)
qc_reduce_cost1.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 10% for QuantumCrème Α, QuantumCrème Β and QuantumCrème Γ.

qc_reduce_cost2.name: Reduce Cost (2/2)
qc_reduce_cost2.description: Reduces the acquisition cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all QuantumCrème Production Machines.

qc_reduce_maintenance1.name: Reduce Maintenance (1/2)
qc_reduce_maintenance1.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 10% for QuantumCrème Α, QuantumCrème Β and QuantumCrème Γ.

qc_reduce_maintenance2.name: Reduce Maintenance (2/2)
qc_reduce_maintenance2.description: Reduces the maintenance cost of a machine by 20% (including discount from 1/2) for all QuantumCrème production machines.

qc_reduce_employee_requirement1.name: Reduce Required Employees (1/2)
qc_reduce_employee_requirement1.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for QuantumCrème Β and 2 for QuantumCrème Γ.
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

qc_reduce_employee_requirement2.name: Reduce Required Employees (2/2)
qc_reduce_employee_requirement2.description:
Reduces the required Employees per machine by 1 for QuantumCrème Α, 2 for QuantumCrème Β, 3 for QuantumCrème Γ, 4 for QuantumCrème Δ and 5 for QuantumCrème Ω. (including reduction from 1/2)
Non-compatible with "reduce resource consumption".

qc_reduce_resource_consumption1.name: Reduce Resource Consumption (1/2)
qc_reduce_resource_consumption1.description:
QuantumCrème Β and QuantumCrème Γ use resources a bit more efficiently.

qc_reduce_resource_consumption2.description:
QuantumCrème Δ and QuantumCrème Ω use resources a bit more efficiently.
Non-compatible with "Reduce Required Employees".

workplace.tab_tooltip: Level up your Workplace and improve your employee rating and happiness.

workplace_root.name: Workplace Root
workplace_root.description: This is the root for all other upgrades.

training_program1.name: Employee Training (1/2)
training_program1.description: Put in place training courses where the employees can improve their skill by 10%

training_program2.name: Employee Training (2/2)
training_program2.description: Improved training courses, helps your employees improve their skill by another 20% (additive)

break_room.name: Break Room
break_room.description: Create a break room for your employees to let of steam. Improves happiness by 0.1

performance_bonuses.name: Performance Bonuses
performance_bonuses.description: Put in place performance bonuses to animate your employees to improve their productivity.

employee_of_the_month.name: Employee of the Month
employee_of_the_month.description: Introduce the Employee of the month award. Boosts happiness and employee rating by 5%

marketing.tab_tooltip: Increase your companys publicity in order to sell more chocolate

billboard_ads1.name: Local Billboards
billboard_ads1.description: Launch your first billboard campaign to catch the eyes of passersby and attract nearby customers.

social_media_ads1.name: Social Media Presence
social_media_ads1.description: Create official brand profiles and start engaging with audiences on popular social platforms.

billboard_ads2.name: Large-Scale Billboard Campaigns
billboard_ads2.description: Expand your outdoor advertising network to key regions for higher visibility and brand recognition.

tv_ads1.name: Television Spots
tv_ads1.description: Produce short TV commercials to reach a broad audience and build credibility with the general public.

social_media_ads2.name: Targeted Online Campaigns
social_media_ads2.description: Use advanced analytics to deliver personalized ads and maximize online engagement.

celebrity_endorsement1.name: Influencer Collaboration
celebrity_endorsement1.description: Partner with influencers to promote your products through relatable and trusted voices.

tv_ads2.name: Prime-Time TV Campaign
tv_ads2.description: Run large-scale advertising campaigns during prime-time slots to dominate viewer attention.

sponsoring1.name: Event Sponsorships
sponsoring1.description: Support community and industry events to strengthen brand reputation and visibility.

celebrity_endorsement2.name: Celebrity Partnership
celebrity_endorsement2.description: Secure a deal with a well-known celebrity to represent your brand and amplify its public image.

holiday_campaigns.name: Holiday Campaigns
holiday_campaigns.description: Launch limited-time offers and festive advertising to capitalize on peak holiday spending.

sponsoring2.name: Major Sponsorship Deals
sponsoring2.description: Invest in large-scale sponsorships, such as sports leagues or cultural events, for massive exposure and prestige.
